title: Client hangs
body: So after the game ends, after clicking the accept button on the victory or defeat screen, the client will hang there for a good 2 minutes or so. It shows the loading icon, but it just seems odd, since it takes longer to load the after game screen than it does to load into the actual game map. Is this just my computer being crap or is there a possible solution for this?

replies.body: You were right, just finished a game and it came in almost immediately. Thank you again!
I bet that's it! I do have that option turned on, thank you so much!

Ooooo you might have one of the new options turned on in the client settings called **close client during game**. With that turned on, the client needs to load entirely from scratch after matches. Go into your client options, make sure that setting is **NOT** checked, and let me know if the post-game loads quicker.
